CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 22, reads: "Dealer Talks - Tumpson and Company a local dealer of Crosley home appliances, was represented here by Ralph Ellison and Wendell Simonson, who explained the many features of these Crosley products."
TitMainTitle: Ralph Ellison and Wendell Simonson standing in Tumpson and Company appliance booth, in Ammon Center for the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
